name: Cabbage Salad with Mango and Peanuts
author: Ann D
summary: The creamy, garlicky dressing for this fiber-rich salad is reminiscent of Thai peanut sauce. For a milder-flavored salad, try savoy or Napa cabbage.
ingredients: ½ head green cabbage, thinly sliced
1 stalk celery, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced on the diagonal
¼ cup smooth unsalted peanut butter
2 tablespoons water, or more as needed
directions: Combine cabbage, mangoes, carrot, celery, and green onions in a large bowl; toss until mixed
Combine peanut butter, lime juice, water, soy sauce, cilantro, garlic, and ginger in a food processor; blend until smooth and the consistency of rich cream
Add 1 to 2 tablespoons water if dressing seems too thick
Pour dressing over cabbage mixture; toss to distribute evenly
